definition: to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet

sentences.english: The June is a rainy season of the year in Wuxi.
sentences.chinese: 六月的无锡，正是梅雨季节。

sentences.english: Frontogenesis and frontolysis have decisive effect on the precipitation near Meiyu front.
sentences.chinese: 锋生锋消对于梅雨锋附近有无降水起到了重要的作用。

sentences.english: And yesterday, the Meteorological Agency announced that the rainy season ended.
sentences.chinese: 跟住星期三，气象厅宣布了梅雨结束了。

sentences.english: Duration of Plum rainy season directly affects crop yield duo to many reasons.
sentences.chinese: 梅雨期长短直接关系农业收成，其成因有多说。

sentences.english: I go to school by bus during the plum-rain season.
sentences.chinese: 在梅雨季节时我搭公车去上学。

sentences.english: Things easily get mildewed in the rainy season.
sentences.chinese: 梅雨季节东西容易发霉。

sentences.english: In south region of Japan, the rainy season has begun.
sentences.chinese: 在日本南部已经入梅雨期。

sentences.english: Lastly, a physic conceptual model is advanced for the typical Meiyu frontal rainstorm system.
sentences.chinese: 最后，提出了典型梅雨锋暴雨系统的物理概念模型。

sentences.english: Newtonian relaxation by nudging is more important to the Mei-yu weather process by forming the large-scale environmental conditions.
sentences.chinese: 对于梅雨天气过程，牛顿连续松弛逼近技术更有效。

sentences.english: Does plum rains season often have a kind to feel airtightly frowzily ?
sentences.chinese: 梅雨季节经常有一种闷不透气的感觉？

sentences.english: Meiyu captures feminine quality of girl' life experience.
How do you go to school during the plum-rain season?
sentences.chinese: 在梅雨季节时你怎么去上学？

sentences.english: This time already was the rainy season.
sentences.chinese: 此时已经是梅雨季节了吧。

definition: Asian rainy season/monsoon/(usually written 梅雨)
to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet
Bailu or White Dew, 15th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 8th-22nd September
Xiaoman or Lesser Full Grain, 8th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 21st May-5th June
Xiaoshu or Lesser Heat, 11th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-22nd July
Liqiu or Start of Autumn, 13th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-22nd August
Hanlu or Cold Dew, 17th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 8th-22nd October
